data.prayer: Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the state of Hadramawt.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Hadramawt, Yemen
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, guide the church in Hadramawt, Yemen to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.section_summary: On average, 13 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in Hadramawt, Yemen.
data.prayer: Jesus, reveal yourself to these new families.
Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Hadramawt, Yemen.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Hadramawt, Yemen so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Arab, Arabic Gulf Spoken people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Arab, Arabic Gulf Spoken people know you.
Father, knowing that teachers will be judged more strictly, help the local leaders in Hadramawt, Yemen to be careful with their words.
data.verse: Not many of you should become teachers, my brothers, for you know that we who teach will be judged with greater strictness.

data.prayer: Father, we suspect there is 1 believer for every 4,888 neighbors who are far from you in Hadramawt. Please, give courage and opportunity to your children to speak boldly.
data.verse: Pray also for me, that whenever I speak, words may be given me so that I will fearlessly make known the mystery of the gospel.

data.prayer: Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the state of Hadramawt.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.

location.name: Hadramawt
